B1 to act in a particular way: She always behaves well/badly when her aunts come to visit. Whenever there was a full moon he would start behaving strangely. They behaved as if nothing had happened.

science
  specialized to show particular behaviour in a particular situation or under particular conditions: They learn how particles behave in solids, liquids, and gases. It is believed that animals behave differently before a natural disaster.
